        <td id="L127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="127"></td>
        <td id="LC127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE GOLDEN BIRD</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="128"></td>
        <td id="LC128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="129"></td>
        <td id="LC129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A certain king had a beautiful garden, and in the garden stood a tree</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="130"></td>
        <td id="LC130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which bore golden apples. These apples were always counted, and about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="131"></td>
        <td id="LC131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the time when they began to grow ripe it was found that every night one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="132"></td>
        <td id="LC132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them was gone. The king became very angry at this, and ordered the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="133"></td>
        <td id="LC133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gardener to keep watch all night under the tree. The gardener set his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="134"></td>
        <td id="LC134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eldest son to watch; but about twelve oâclock he fell asleep, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="135"></td>
        <td id="LC135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the morning another of the apples was missing. Then the second son was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="136"></td>
        <td id="LC136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ordered to watch; and at midnight he too fell asleep, and in the morning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="137"></td>
        <td id="LC137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another apple was gone. Then the third son offered to keep watch; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="138"></td>
        <td id="LC138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the gardener at first would not let him, for fear some harm should come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="139"></td>
        <td id="LC139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him: however, at last he consented, and the young man laid himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="140"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="141"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="142"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="143"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only it dropped a golden feather from its tail, and then flew away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="145"></td>
        <td id="LC145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The golden feather was brought to the king in the morning, and all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="146"></td>
        <td id="LC146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">council was called together. Everyone agreed that it was worth more than</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="150"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="207"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="764"></td>

        <td id="L773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="773"></td>

        <td id="L847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="847"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="857"></td>
        <td id="LC857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but if the old woman had got me into the pan, I should have been made</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="860"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="865"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="895"></td>
        <td id="LC895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A king and queen once upon a time reigned in a country a great way off,</td>

        <td id="L944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="944"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="949"></td>
        <td id="LC949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she turned it the door sprang open, and there sat an old lady spinning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="950"></td>

        <td id="L1486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1486"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1574"></td>
        <td id="LC1574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whilst she was speaking, a frog put its head out of the water, and said,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1759"></td>
        <td id="LC1759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The king of a great land died, and left his queen to take care of their</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1995"></td>
        <td id="LC1995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">1. HOW THEY WENT TO THE MOUNTAINS TO EAT NUTS</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2024"></td>

        <td id="L2026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2026"></td>
        <td id="LC2026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friend, the pin, had been at a public-house a few miles off, and had sat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2027"></td>
        <td id="LC2027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drinking till they had forgotten how late it was; he begged therefore</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2028"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2029"></td>
        <td id="LC2029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carriage. Chanticleer observing that they were but thin fellows, and not</td>

        <td id="L2030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2030"></td>
        <td id="LC2030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">likely to take up much room, told them they might ride, but made them</td>

        <td id="L2031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2031"></td>
        <td id="LC2031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">promise not to dirty the wheels of the carriage in getting in, nor to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2032"></td>

        <td id="L2035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2035"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L2112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2112"></td>
        <td id="LC2112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">3. HOW PARTLET DIED AND WAS BURIED, AND HOW CHANTICLEER DIED OF GRIEF</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2113"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2114"></td>
        <td id="LC2114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Another day Chanticleer and Partlet agreed to go again to the mountains</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2115"></td>
        <td id="LC2115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to eat nuts; and it was settled that all the nuts which they found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2116"></td>
        <td id="LC2116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should be shared equally between them. Now Partlet found a very large</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2117"></td>
        <td id="LC2117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nut; but she said nothing about it to Chanticleer, and kept it all to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2118"></td>
        <td id="LC2118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herself: however, it was so big that she could not swallow it, and it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2119"></td>
        <td id="LC2119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stuck in her throat. Then she was in a great fright, and cried out to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2120"></td>
        <td id="LC2120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chanticleer, âPray run as fast as you can, and fetch me some water, or I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2121"></td>
        <td id="LC2121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall be choked.â Chanticleer ran as fast as he could to the river, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2122"></td>
        <td id="LC2122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said, âRiver, give me some water, for Partlet lies in the mountain, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2123"></td>
        <td id="LC2123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be choked by a great nut.â The river said, âRun first to the bride,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2124"></td>
        <td id="LC2124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and ask her for a silken cord to draw up the water.â Chanticleer ran to</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2208"></td>
        <td id="LC2208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Rapunzel grew into the most beautiful child under the sun. When she was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2209"></td>
        <td id="LC2209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twelve years old, the enchantress shut her into a tower, which lay in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2210"></td>
        <td id="LC2210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a forest, and had neither stairs nor door, but quite at the top was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2211"></td>
        <td id="LC2211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little window. When the enchantress wanted to go in, she placed herself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2212"></td>
        <td id="LC2212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beneath it and cried:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2480"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2569"></td>
        <td id="LC2569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horsemen and said: âThe work is done; I have finished both of them</td>

        <td id="L2649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2649"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2651"></td>
        <td id="LC2651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hard by a great forest dwelt a poor wood-cutter with his wife and his</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2658"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2927"></td>
        <td id="LC2927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had laid aside his burden, they sat down to table, and when they had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2928"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2931"></td>
        <td id="LC2931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Influenced by those remarks, the bird next morning refused to bring in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2932"></td>
        <td id="LC2932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wood, telling the others that he had been their servant long enough,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2933"></td>
        <td id="LC2933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and had been a fool into the bargain, and that it was now time to make a</td>

        <td id="L2934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2934"></td>
        <td id="LC2934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">change, and to try some other way of arranging the work. Beg and pray</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2935"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2936"></td>
        <td id="LC2936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">master of the situation, and the venture had to be made. They therefore</td>

        <td id="L2972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2972"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2974"></td>
        <td id="LC2974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Once upon a time there was a widow who had two daughters; one of them</td>

        <td id="L2978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2978"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2981"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3018"></td>

        <td id="L3206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3206"></td>

        <td id="L3746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3746"></td>

        <td id="L3754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3754"></td>
        <td id="LC3754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was once a cook named Gretel, who wore shoes with red heels, and</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3833"></td>
        <td id="LC3833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was once a very old man, whose eyes had become dim, his ears dull</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC3924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said: âCome and eat some more with me.â The peasant did not require to</td>

        <td id="L3926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3926"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4187"></td>
        <td id="LC4187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4188"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4190"></td>
        <td id="LC4190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4191"></td>
        <td id="LC4191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">SWEETHEART ROLAND</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4192"></td>
        <td id="LC4192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4193"></td>
        <td id="LC4193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was once upon a time a woman who was a real witch and had two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4194"></td>
        <td id="LC4194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">daughters, one ugly and wicked, and this one she loved because she was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4195"></td>
        <td id="LC4195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her own daughter, and one beautiful and good, and this one she hated,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4196"></td>
        <td id="LC4196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because she was her stepdaughter. The stepdaughter once had a pretty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4197"></td>
        <td id="LC4197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apron, which the other fancied so much that she became envious, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4198"></td>
        <td id="LC4198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told her mother that she must and would have that apron. âBe quiet, my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4199"></td>
        <td id="LC4199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">child,â said the old woman, âand you shall have it. Your stepsister has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4200"></td>
        <td id="LC4200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long deserved death; tonight when she is asleep I will come and cut her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4201"></td>
        <td id="LC4201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head off. Only be careful that you are at the far side of the bed, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4202"></td>
        <td id="LC4202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">push her well to the front.â It would have been all over with the poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4203"></td>
        <td id="LC4203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">girl if she had not just then been standing in a corner, and heard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4204"></td>
        <td id="LC4204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything. All day long she dared not go out of doors, and when bedtime</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4205"></td>
        <td id="LC4205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had come, the witchâs daughter got into bed first, so as to lie at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4206"></td>
        <td id="LC4206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far side, but when she was asleep, the other pushed her gently to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4207"></td>
        <td id="LC4207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">front, and took for herself the place at the back, close by the wall. In</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4208"></td>
        <td id="LC4208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the night, the old woman came creeping in, she held an axe in her right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4209"></td>
        <td id="LC4209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand, and felt with her left to see if anyone were lying at the outside,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4210"></td>
        <td id="LC4210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and then she grasped the axe with both hands, and cut her own childâs</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4211"></td>
        <td id="LC4211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head off.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4212"></td>
        <td id="LC4212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4213"></td>
        <td id="LC4213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When she had gone away, the girl got up and went to her sweetheart, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4214"></td>
        <td id="LC4214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was called Roland, and knocked at his door. When he came out, she said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC4215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him: âListen, dearest Roland, we must fly in all haste; my stepmother</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4216"></td>
        <td id="LC4216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wanted to kill me, but has struck her own child. When daylight comes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4217"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4220"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4222"></td>
        <td id="LC4222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hurried away with her lover.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4223"></td>
        <td id="LC4223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4224"></td>
        <td id="LC4224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the old witch got up next morning, she called her daughter, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4225"></td>
        <td id="LC4225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wanted to give her the apron, but she did not come. Then the witch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4226"></td>
        <td id="LC4226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cried: âWhere are you?â âHere, on the stairs, I am sweeping,â answered</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4227"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4234"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4271"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4550"></td>
        <td id="LC4550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was once upon a time a queen to whom God had given no children.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4551"></td>
        <td id="LC4551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Every morning she went into the garden and prayed to God in heaven to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4552"></td>
        <td id="LC4552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bestow on her a son or a daughter. Then an angel from heaven came to her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4553"></td>
        <td id="LC4553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and said: âBe at rest, you shall have a son with the power of wishing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4554"></td>
        <td id="LC4554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so that whatsoever in the world he wishes for, that shall he have.â Then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4555"></td>
        <td id="LC4555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she went to the king, and told him the joyful tidings, and when the time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4556"></td>
        <td id="LC4556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was come she gave birth to a son, and the king was filled with gladness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4557"></td>
        <td id="LC4557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4558"></td>
        <td id="LC4558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Every morning she went with the child to the garden where the wild</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4559"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4560"></td>
        <td id="LC4560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happened once when the child was a little older, that it was lying in</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4566"></td>
        <td id="LC4566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accused the queen of having allowed her child to be taken from her by</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4637"></td>
        <td id="LC4637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now the king felt great joy at this, and commanded that his entire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4638"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5448"></td>

        <td id="L6356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6356"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7166"></td>
        <td id="LC7166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brother, and he, too, was at last obliged to take up his abode in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7167"></td>
        <td id="LC7167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart of the mountains. Thus it is with proud silly people, who think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7168"></td>
        <td id="LC7168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves above everyone else, and are too proud to ask or take advice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7169"></td>
        <td id="LC7169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7170"></td>
        <td id="LC7170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the second prince had thus been gone a long time, the youngest son</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7171"></td>
        <td id="LC7171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said he would go and search for the Water of Life, and trusted he should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7172"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7173"></td>
        <td id="LC7173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">met him too at the same spot in the valley, among the mountains, and</td>

        <td id="L7174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7174"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7176"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7179"></td>
        <td id="LC7179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and are wise enough to seek for advice, I will tell you how and where to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7180"></td>
        <td id="LC7180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go. The water you seek springs from a well in an enchanted castle; and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7181"></td>
        <td id="LC7181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that you may be able to reach it in safety, I will give you an iron wand</td>

        <td id="L7182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7182"></td>
        <td id="LC7182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and two little loaves of bread; strike the iron door of the castle three</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7183"></td>
        <td id="LC7183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">times with the wand, and it will open: two hungry lions will be lying</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7184"></td>
        <td id="LC7184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down inside gaping for their prey, but if you throw them the bread they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC7185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will let you pass; then hasten on to the well, and take some of the</td>

        <td id="L7186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7186"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7249"></td>
        <td id="LC7249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7250"></td>
        <td id="LC7250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When they came to their journeyâs end, the youngest son brought his cup</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7251"></td>
        <td id="LC7251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the sick king, that he might drink and be healed. Scarcely, however,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7252"></td>
        <td id="LC7252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had he tasted the bitter sea-water when he became worse even than he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7253"></td>
        <td id="LC7253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before; and then both the elder sons came in, and blamed the youngest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7254"></td>
        <td id="LC7254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for what they had done; and said that he wanted to poison their father,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7255"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7345"></td>

        <td id="L7351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7351"></td>

        <td id="L7353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7353"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8505"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8772"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L8798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8798"></td>
        <td id="LC8798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was once a king, whose queen had hair of the purest gold, and was</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9189"></td>
        <td id="LC9189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Brothers Grimm, Jacob (1785-1863) and Wilhelm (1786-1859), were born</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9190"></td>
        <td id="LC9190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in Hanau, near Frankfurt, in the German state of Hesse. Throughout</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9191"></td>
        <td id="LC9191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their lives they remained close friends, and both studied law at Marburg</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9192"></td>
        <td id="LC9192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">University. Jacob was a pioneer in the study of German philology,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9193"></td>
        <td id="LC9193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and although Wilhelmâs work was hampered by poor health the brothers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9194"></td>
        <td id="LC9194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">collaborated in the creation of a German dictionary, not completed until</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9195"></td>
        <td id="LC9195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a century after their deaths. But they were best (and universally) known</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9196"></td>
        <td id="LC9196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the collection of over two hundred folk tales they made from oral</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9197"></td>
        <td id="LC9197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sources and published in two volumes of âNursery and Household Talesâ in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9198"></td>
        <td id="LC9198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">1812 and 1814. Although their intention was to preserve such material as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9199"></td>
        <td id="LC9199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part of German cultural and literary history, and their collection was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9200"></td>
        <td id="LC9200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first published with scholarly notes and no illustration, the tales soon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9201"></td>
        <td id="LC9201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came into the possession of young readers. This was in part due to Edgar</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9202"></td>
        <td id="LC9202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Taylor, who made the first English translation in 1823, selecting about</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9224"></td>
        <td id="LC9224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Creating the works from public domain print editions means that no</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9225"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9406"></td>
        <td id="LC9406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">1.F.1.  Project Gutenberg volunteers and employees expend considerable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9407"></td>
        <td id="LC9407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effort to identify, do copyright research on, transcribe and proofread</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9408"></td>
        <td id="LC9408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">public domain works in creating the Project Gutenberg-tm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9409"></td>

</td>
